comment._content: This is lovely! May I recommend a few related resources: These are some lovely vintage 40s dresses: www.lindybop.co.uk/ These are some modern dresses with some vintage influence, adapted to modern trends: www.dorothyperkins.com/en/dpuk/category/dresses-203543/home Thanks again for sharing these fantastic pictures! x
